1.content: Design and implement comprehensive ISSB membership system architecture
1.details: Create full-stack application with authentication, database, and multiple portals including events, volunteers, donations, admin, and application review

2.details: 1. Get Supabase credentials from user 2. Design database schema (users, memberships, events, volunteers, donations, applications) 3. Setup authentication 4. Create edge functions for complex operations

3.details: 1. Event creation and management 2. Event registration system 3. Calendar integration 4. Event analytics 5. Capacity tracking 6. Event filtering and search

4.details: 1. Volunteer profile management 2. Volunteer hour tracking 3. Volunteer opportunity listings 4. Hour reporting system 5. Volunteer task assignment 6. Progress tracking dashboard

5.details: 1. Donation processing (integrate with payment system) 2. Donation history tracking 3. Tax receipt generation 4. Donation goal tracking 5. Recurring donation setup 6. Donor dashboard

6.details: 1. User management (CRUD operations) 2. Membership management 3. System settings 4. Analytics dashboard 5. Content management 6. Role-based permissions

7.details: 1. Application processing workflow 2. Document verification 3. Reference checking 4. Approval/rejection workflow 5. Application tracking 6. Email notifications

8.details: 1. User registration and login 2. Role-based access control 3. Membership tier permissions 4. Session management 5. Password reset functionality

9.content: Create unified navigation and portal routing
9.details: 1. Main navigation with all portals 2. Role-based menu items 3. Portal switching functionality 4. Breadcrumb navigation 5. Mobile-responsive design

10.details: 1. Deploy to production 2. Test all portals functionality 3. Verify authentication flows 4. Test admin operations 5. Performance optimization
